properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 5:45AM MST by NWS Albuquerque NM
properties.description:
Areas of dense freezing fog, light snow, and light freezing
drizzle will make travel hazardous across central and eastern
Curry and Roosevelt Counties until mid morning. The visibility
will drop near 1/4 mile at times in places like Clovis, Portales,
Dora, and Milnesand. The freezing fog and freezing drizzle may
combine to produce a light glaze of ice on roads, and especially
bridges and overpasses. Use low beam headlights, slow down, and
allow extra travel time to reach your destinations.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS TRAVEL IN PARTS OF CURRY AND ROOSEVELT COUNTY EARLY THIS MORNING
